title: Café Discount for Employees
content:
To all office workers,

We are excited to announce a special discount program at Sunlight Café, located on the first floor of the Greenway Office Building. Starting next Monday, all employees will receive a 15 percent discount on selected menu items during weekday lunch hours. This offer was created in partnership with the building management team to support healthier and more convenient meal options for employees.

The discount applies to sandwiches, salads, and the daily lunch special. To receive the discount, simply show your employee ID card at the register before making your payment. Please note that the offer is not valid for beverages, desserts, or items ordered through delivery services.

Sunlight Café has also added several new vegetarian and low-calorie options to its menu. These items will be clearly marked with a green leaf icon. The café hopes that these additions will make it easier for employees to enjoy nutritious meals during busy workdays.

If you have any questions about the discount program or would like to suggest additional menu items, feel free to contact the café manager at info@sunlightcafe.com.

We hope you enjoy this special offer and look forward to serving you soon!

choices_text: A printed coupon from the café
A receipt from a previous visit
